TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The world has now become a utopian dystopia in which everyone is happy and there is no dissent. HEY! I thinkg that's not righ-

I wish for an uncorruptable wish.

Wish granted, but the wish also does 42 random things before your wish, so if you get hit on the head with a flying two ton eraser don't be surprised. 

*digs through notes* 

I wish for a wish of wishes to make a wish for more fun. 

On 4/28/2016 at 6:14 AM, SpaceplaneAddict said:

Your wish failed miserably because I have too much of a kind heart.

 

I wish for a wish of wishes to make a wish for more fun.

Granted. You have more fun.

I doubt if I have a wish.

granted, you are doubtful for all of eternity

I wish for a wish to wish for a wish

Granted, but along the line it turns into grey goo but with genies.

I wish for a collection of poems about the moon written in the future by space colonists.

Granted but they didn't know about earth's moon so they wrote poems about the Mun

I wish for algebra

Granted, but it's linear algebra.

I wish for understanding of mathematics sufficient to solve the three-body problem.

Granted, but that's the only problem you can solve. When your children ask for math help, they fail due to the fact they know advanced math, but not the answer to 2 + 2.

I wish for my team to win the number war!

Granted, you learn Newtonian orbital mechanics 

i wish for a heart

(posted at the same time as dark owl)

Edited May 8, 2017 by kerbinorbiter

Your heart gets broken.

 

I wish for cheese.

Granted. It's moldy.

I wish I could have a PC that didn't crash

Granted...but it cannot not have KSP crash

(kerbal crashes because it does)

i wish to know Kerbins food chain

Granted.., you are at the bottom!

I wish for Jeb to visit Earth

Granted: Shortly after his touchdown, he is found by scientists who detain him for the rest of his life in a secret research facility. Way to go. 

I wish i was a very tasty potato.

Granted. You are eaten.

I wish our wishes went the way we want them to.

Granted. A paradox error of the wishes drives you mad.

I wish to live in a random, but reasonable movie.

Granted. You drown because you got put in Titanic.

I wish to be able to finish Civil War before the school year ends

Granted, the school year is 10 years long

i wish to hoverslam a rocket first

Granted. It's the only thing you can do for all eternity.

I actually like school.. Just without the idiots.

I wish the people who didn't want to learn stuff could just go away

Not granted (which is a fact anyways and I feel the same way)

i wish to be a wish

Granted easily. A mosquito lands on your shoulder. You are its wish.
(Combo! Double wish granted.)

I wish the previous poster's Soyuz had landing legs.

Edited May 10, 2017 by kerbiloid

Granted, but it tears itself to pieces upon deployment because thet deploy towards the inside of the craft.

I wish I had a theme song.

Granted. It's from Bill Cipher's Weirdmageddon.

 

I wish for an M-16A4.

Granted.
You appear in a far, hot country. You are a sentry defending a small depot with washed clothes.
Five gloomy men are approaching to you with silent question in their eyes, pulling out knives, 

I wish you also had ammo.

Granted.

You are one of the five men, whom he shoots.

I wish I could get my TOR browser working again. (Seriously)
